title: Passive Voice With Prepositions - 3
instructions: Rewrite the sentences. Put them into B1Passive VoiceB2. Keep the tenses and pay attention to the B1prepositionsB2.
exa:
They will ask about you.
You will be asked about by them.
They didn't care about this building.
This building was not cared about.

contents.longsent: He based his novel on a book by Pynchon.
alters: His novel was based on a book by Pynchon.

contents.longsent: They will translate your book into Japanese.
alters: Your book will be translated into Japanese.

contents.longsent: Your colleagues look up to you.
alters: You are looked up to by your colleagues.

contents.longsent: The teacher shouted at your son.
alters: Your son was shouted at by the teacher.

contents.longsent: They have made an example of George.
They didn't fill in the document.
alters: The document was not filled in.

contents.longsent: They arranged for a new meeting between the Prime Ministers.
contents.starter: A new meeting between the Prime Ministers...

contents.longsent: They won't search for your dog.
alters: Your dog won't be searched for.
Your dog will not be searched for.
